DOC.brief_summary: The goal study see addition carbohydrate- protein-enhanced gel labor speed labor reduces rate cesarean delivery .
DOC.brief_title: Enhanced v . Routine Clear Liquid Intake Labor
DOC.detailed_description: Patients randomize placebo experimental arm study . In placebo arm , patient receive standard clear liquid diet , include ginger ale , variety fruit juice , plain soup broth . The experimental arm receive standard clear liquid diet , addition receive Accel Gel every 3 hour labor .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Nulliparity ( first baby ) Admission intent deliver vaginally Gestational age > 36 week Age â‰¥ 18 Exclusion criterion : Planned cesarean delivery Renal Disease Preeclampsia Diabetes ( Pregestational Gestational ) Allergy component sport drink NPO diet physician
